name: Remote PowerShell Sessions Network Connections (WinRM)
description: Detects basic PowerShell Remoting (WinRM) by monitoring for network inbound connections to ports 5985 OR 5986
false_positives: Legitimate use of remote PowerShell execution
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:5156 AND destination.port:(5985 OR 5986) AND winlog.event_data.LayerRTID:44)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:5156 AND destination.port:(5985 OR 5986) AND winlog.event_data.LayerRTID:44)`
